name: planner_agent
description: Plans and breaks down complex code search requests into actionable tasks using available essay research, section writer, and reviewer agents

skills.name: Essay Writing Task Planning
skills.description: Breaks down complex essay writing requests into actionable subtasks using available agent types: essay_research, essay_review, essay_section_writing
examples: Plan the steps to write an essay on the cultural impact of star wars
Create a strategy for refactoring legacy code modules
Design a workflow for documenting undocumented API endpoints
Plan a reseach and writing a section of an essay
Create tasks for reviewing this essay

skills.name: Agent Task Mapping
skills.description: Maps user requests to appropriate agent types and creates specific task descriptions
examples: Map 'How do I improve my essay' to essay_review tasks
Map 'write this section of my essay' to essay_reasearch and essay_section_writing tasks
Create multi-step workflows combining different agent types
